text:
anyone want to be in a fun jury? here’s what a former colleague of mine sent me: 

Take a couple hours out of your day on Nov 10 to participate in a Community Pitch from four non-profit teams looking for feedback, assistance, connections and funding for their ideas. You’ll also get to help decide who will get $12k to support the development of their idea. Here’s the link to the invitation: 

<http://www.unitedway-pdx.org/everyonein/everyonein-community-pitch>
Please let me or Joel know if you are interested
